jp_text: 今度は神経内科へ…｡
《なんだよ…!?》

en_text: ...I won't be able to keep my promise to Sharon.
jp_text: 《シャロンとの約束が…》
もう１人は日本にいます｡

en_text: Then, please fill in their contact information.
jp_text: では ここに連絡先を…｡
とても…重い病気ですので｡
google_translated: Very ... because it is a heavy illness.

en_text: Sharon must have realized that she had a serious disorder.
jp_text: 自分が何らかの病気である事は➡
彼女は笑顔をやめなかった＞
何なの？…ＡＬＳって？

en_text: It's the disease that killed my father.
jp_text: 私の父が亡くなった病気です｡
google_translated: My father is a disease died.

en_text: You become unable to talk, eat,
jp_text: 食べることも 話すことも…➡
google_translated: You can also talk to eat ... ➡

jp_text: 《あの シャロンが…》
⦅は…速いって？⦆
＜テストの結果は…最悪だった＞
google_translated: <The result of the test is ... the worst>

en_text: Eight days after her examination ended,
jp_text: ＜シャロンの検査から８日後…➡

en_text: In a few months, Sharon will no longer be able to play the piano anymore.
jp_text: あと数ヵ月で シャロンは➡
google_translated: Some months in a few months

jp_text: それでも彼女は笑っていた＞
シャロン！

en_text: I can't wait to see it happen.
jp_text: ありがと 楽しみにしてる｡

en_text: Since I'll probably be saying it all the time.
jp_text: なんか俺 よく使いそうだから｡
そうね…｡
え～と イッツ ア…｡
自由に使っていいわよ｡

en_text: “It's a piece of cake"って英語 have you ever used the phrase, "it's a piece of cake"?
jp_text: 使った事ある？せりかさん｡

en_text: but I know what it means. it means that something is easy, right?
jp_text: “楽勝だよ"って事ですよね｡
そう…“楽勝だよ"｡

en_text: I was actually requesting a self-derogatory English phrase.
jp_text: でも そん時 本当は➡
って 堂々とウソを！
私も ３年後か４年後かに…➡

jp_text: 言ってくれるじゃないの ムッタ｡
